item.title: President’s Commencement Colloquy | May 9
item.description: Friday / May 9, 2025 at 3:30 pm Join us on May 9 for a Fireside Chat between RPI President Martin A. Schmidt ’81 and Lisa Su, chair and CEO of AMD. Doors open at 3 p.m. Colloquy begins at 3:30 p.m. in the EMPAC Concert Hall followed by a reception at Evelyn’s Café. Free and open to the public. Graduation Driving Technology Innovation in Industry
item.author: Community

item.title: Noise From Construction Monday, May 12th & 13th
item.description: Starting the afternoon of Monday, May 12th or the morning of Tuesday, May 13, in the Vicinity of Lally Hall & Admissions Building, a crew will begin repairs on the campus fire escapes starting with Lally Hall, followed by the Admissions Building. All work will be performed during normal business hours. This work will involve grinding and drilling, which may result in elevated noise levels and vibrations in the surrounding areas.

item.title: Student Success Announced 2025 Last Lecture Speakers
item.description: Over 300 graduating seniors chose Christianna Bennett, Ron Hedden, Benjamin Weissman, Wes Turner, and Sarah Parker Ward for the Class of 2025 Last Lecture Series. Inspired by Dr. Randy Pausch’s tradition, five 20-minute talks will be held, followed by a reception. The event is open to the Rensselaer community, with priority for graduating students.
item.author: Community

item.title: Pittsburgh Building Closed for Renovations This Summer | 5/12-8/21
item.description: Date: Monday, May 12, 2025 12:00 AM - Thu , August 21, 2025 12:00 AM - The Pittsburgh Building will be fully closed for renovations beginning Monday, May 12, and will remain inaccessible through Wednesday, August 21. During this period, no access will be permitted for any faculty, staff, students, or visitors. Please plan accordingly. Thank you for your cooperation as we work to improve our facilities.

item.title: Fiscal Year 2026 Holiday Schedule is Now Available
item.description:
Rensselaer is pleased to offer 10 paid employee holidays during the 2026 fiscal year (July 1, 2025 – June 30, 2026). As part of this, the Institute will be closed for the Holiday Winter Break from Wednesday, December 24, 2025, through Friday, January 2, 2026, and will reopen and resume normal operations on Monday, January 5, 2026. The full Holiday Schedule, including Winter Break Appreciation Days, for FY26 can be found at https://hr.rpi.edu/benefits/paid-time-holidays.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
